meanings.definition: A game played with wooden balls on a level, rectangular court.
meanings.sent1: We had fun playing bocce in the park.
meanings.sent2: The bocce court was well-maintained and inviting.
meanings.sent3: During the bocce game, I accidentally rolled the ball too far.
meanings.sent4: The sound of wooden balls clacking together echoed across the bocce court.
meanings.sent5: The players' laughter filled the air as they enjoyed a game of bocce.

meanings.definition: To play the game of bocce.
meanings.sent2: They bocce every Sunday afternoon at the community center.
meanings.sent3: I bocce with my friends to relax after a long week.
meanings.sent4: She bocces with such precision, always aiming for the target.
meanings.sent5: Boccing under the clear sky brought a sense of joy to the group.
